title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:
Introducing the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins, perfect for adding a festive touch to your holiday gatherings! 

These napkins feature a beautiful Christmas Nativity scene design, with smooth and glossy blue polyester material. The gold embroidered texts add an elegant touch, with sayings like "Joy", "Love", "Blessed", "Merry", "Believe", and "Peace". 

These napkins are not only stylish, but also practical. They are washable and reusable, making them eco-friendly and cost-effective. Measuring 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm), they are the perfect size for your table setting. 

These napkins are ideal for Christmas, religious, or festive occasions. They symbolize the religious significance of Christmas, making them a thoughtful gift idea for family, friends, or fellow believers. 

Each set includes 12 embroidered Christmas cloth napkins, ensuring you have enough for all your guests. 

Please note that there may be slight errors in size due to manual measurement, and slight color variation may occur due to screen display. Rest assured, the words used in the design are not used as trademarks, only for expression.
